sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sell', templateUrl: './sell.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sell.component.css'] }) export class SellComponent { signForm = new FormGroup({ NIP: new FormControl('', Validators.required), name: new FormControl('', Validators.required), email: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]), ticket_count: new FormControl('', Validators.required), event_name: new FormControl('', Validators.required) }) onSubmit(){ console.log(this.signForm.value); this.signForm.reset() } }
